com.core.adnsdk

Class InterstitialAdRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.core.adnsdk.InterstitialAdRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdRenderer

    public class InterstitialAdRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdRenderer
    Default InterstitialAdRenderer of SDK. It inflates layout from xml for user, but user still needs to give out custom layout from xml. SDK takes cares of life cycles of an AdView for user, such as init, create, load, render, clean, release, etc. If user wants to manipulate life cycles of an AdView by their own, like changing view's visibility, user needs to create a renderer extends from AdRenderer.
    Since:
    2016-03-15

        public void loadingAdView(android.view.View view,
                 AdObject adObject)
        Description copied from interface: AdRenderer

        Render AdView. User could dynamically customize AdView by changing its visibility, layout, or data.
        Specified by:
        renderAdView in interface AdRenderer
        Parameters:
        view - The root view of AdView.
        adObject - The Ad resources of AdView.
        interactView - User requires to specify views needed to get interaction, such as call to action button.
        maps - SDK uses maps to notify user Ad resources are ready, such as bitmaps of main, icon, cover images.
